title: Livian
description: Fairy tales return to darkness as a wingless half-breed child, Livian, unaware of her royal warrior lineage, struggles with the unaccepted gnarling of her roots and purpose of her twisted life. Her only connection with the outside world is her grandfather, Inennious, as he protects both her existence and the hidden remaining dragons by leaving behind all forms of society to live in solitude for fear of the mysterious creature intent on possessing the soul of every Alpha in the world in order to dominate all that exists. How long can Innenious keep a growing young girl hidden from the world? Will Livian discover her secret Alpha royalty before the possessor? Her destiny holds the decided fate of the world and the battle begins within her very soul.
author: Michelle Anderson Picarella
